CustomField.description: Set the shingle standard based on the service region. The default is Canada shingle standard
CustomField.formula: CASE( Conga_Service_Region__c , 'US', 'Asphalt Roofing Manufacturers Association (ARMA)', 'Canadian Asphalt Shingle Manufacturers Association (CASMA)')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the shingle standard based on the service region. The default is Canada shingle standard
CustomField.label: Shingle Association
